trans-unit.source: Represents a canonicalizer that converts HTTP request data into a standard form appropriate for signing.
trans-unit.target: Represents a canonicalizer that converts HTTP request data into a standard form appropriate for signing.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how to authenticate a request, see <externalLink><linkText>Authentication for the Windows Azure Storage Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dd179428.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
